mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER (member_no, member_id, member_password1, member_password2, member_name, member_addr, member_email, member_phone, member_regdate, member_grade) values (member_no_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{member_password1}, #{member_password2}, #{member_name}, #{member_addr}, #{member_email}, #{member_phone}, sysdate, #{member_grade})
mapper.select: select * from MEMBER where member_id = #{member_id} and member_password1 = #{member_password1}
